evidence.claim: Helping Hands Home Care Service uses AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for data protection and patient privacy.
Integration of FHIR standards is mentioned for electronic health information exchange.
The platform supports HL7 messaging for interoperability in healthcare.
The company emphasizes an API-first approach in its development process.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of sending/receiving X12 transactions found on the site.
